name: Hell's Kitchen (Luis S.)
description:
Even the lost souls from beyond the void enjoy a good meal from time to time. Luckily for them, Hell's Kitchen is open 24/7! You are not so happy, though... You are the only employee, and the orders keep piling on!

- - - - - - -

Deliver the food to your spirit consumers before they get angry. They are very specific in their demands!

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse to look
  • Right and left mouse buttons to pick up food

If you are having problems with the web version, please download the Windows executable.

- - - - - - -

This is an entry to the GMTK Jam 2020. Expect a few bugs. Have fun!

Thank you to Kenney and QuaterniusDev for their great assets!

- - - - - - -
